title: A complete mess of a remake.
review: I grew up watching the first movie and it's always been one of my all time favorites. I know this is a retelling of the original but it's always a mistake to make changes simply to make changes. The excess profane language isn't needed, the look of Pennywise is horrible compared to Tim Curry's portrayal, it just never seemed to make any sense. Twenty minutes in, I started looking at my watch waiting for it to be over. I understand that some people like remakes but this is a textbook example of Hollywood not having any new ideas and instead screwing with the classics we grew up with.
